dmca.title: Astro E-Design Solutions Complains to Search Engine
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

It has come to my attention that there are several websites showing up in the Google search results that have plagiarized content off of my website. I will detail each instance separately below.

Instance #1: Immediate Solutions Computer Services
The copyrighted work that has been plagiarized appears on numerous pages of this website:

http://www.immediatescs.com/webdesign.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/design/designdetails.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/design/cms.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/design/ddi.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/contact.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/design.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/ecommerce.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/ecommerce.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/cms.htm
http://www.immediatescs.com/database.htm
Search Query: "attractive web sites that load quickly" 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.immediatescs.com/site.htm
Contact email: [PRIVATE]@immediatescs.com 

Instance #2: ltron Africa
The copyrighted work that has been plagiarized appears on numerous pages of this website:

http://www.itron.co.za/About.aspx
http://www.itron.co.za/Mission.aspx
http://www.itron.co.za/Services.aspx
http://www.itron.co.za/Contact.aspx

Search Query: "attractive, user-friendly and profitable" 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.itron.co.za/Services.aspx

Contact email: [PRIVATE]itron.co.za

Instance #3: TJ Webworks

The copyrighted work that has been plagiarized appears on this page of this website: http://www.tjwebworks.com/text/about.htmI

Search Query: "the need of the small business owner for web design at an affordable price" 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.tjwebworks.com/text/about.html

Contact email: [PRIVATE]@tjwebworks.com 

Instance #4: Digital Daydream

The copyrighted work that has been plagiarized appears on numerous pages of this website:

http://www.diditaldaydream.com/html/ws/ocms.htm
http://www.digitaldaydream.com/html/ws/ecom.htm

Search Query: "Point. Click. Edit. It's that simple!"
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.digitaldaydream.com/html/ws/ocms.htm

Contact email: [PRIVATE]@digitaldaydream.com

Instance #5: Ecom Web Solutions

The copyrighted work that has been plagiarized appears on numerous pages of this website: http://www.ecomweb.no

Search Query: "Professional. Friendly. Affordable." 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.ecomweb.no

This site also infringes upon a previous design theme that was used for my website: http://web.archive.org/web/20031212211457/http://design-integrity.net/

Contact email: [PRIVATE]@ecomweb.no

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Sincerely,
[PRIVATE]
[PRIVATE]@design-integrity.net
